# TruffleHog exclusions for GreaterWMS
# Add paths that should be excluded from secrets scanning

# Static files and assets
static/
media/
templates/dist/
templates/node_modules/
app/src-cordova/

# Build artifacts
*.log
*.min.js
*.map

# Documentation and examples
README*.md
CHANGELOG.md
docs/
*.example
*.sample

# Configuration templates (not actual configs)
*.template
*.dist

# Test files with dummy data
**/test*/**
**/*test*
**/*.test.*
tests/

# Package files
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
requirements.txt

# Git and CI files
.git/
.github/
.gitignore

# Virtual environments
venv/
env/
node_modules/

# Database migrations (may contain example data)
migrations/

# Compiled Python files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-*
